title: Portfolio
summary: This is an interactive web application that showcases my frontend skills in an engaging way. Users can explore various technologies and projects I have worked on. With animations and responsive design, it provides a smooth experience on all devices.

title: Smart guys app
summary: This is a user management application built with Angular, demonstrating my ability to work with modern frontend frameworks. It features full CRUD functionality, lazy-loaded components for optimized performance, and a responsive design for seamless usability across devices.
